definition: drinking water/to obtain water (for daily needs)/to absorb water/draft (of ship)
to eat/to consume/to eat at (a cafeteria etc)/to eradicate/to destroy/to absorb/to suffer/to stammer (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [ji2])
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
see 吃水不忘掘井人[chi1 shui3 bu4 wang4 jue2 jing3 ren2]
pinyin: chi1 shui3 bu4 wang4 wa1 jing3 ren2

definition: Drinking the water of a well, one should never forget who dug it. (idiom)
pinyin: chi1 shui3 bu4 wang4 jue2 jing3 ren2

definition: lit. the mountain dweller lives off the mountain, the shore dweller lives off the sea (idiom)/fig. to make the best use of local resources/to exploit one's position to advance oneself/to find one's niche/to live off the land
pinyin: kao4 shan1 chi1 shan1 , kao4 shui3 chi1 shui3

sentences.english: I plan to absorb water celery soup and beef cutlet.
sentences.chinese: 我打算吃水芹菜汤和牛排。

sentences.english: Does eating fruits and veggies make you more attractive?
sentences.chinese: 吃水果和素食真的能让你更迷人吗？

sentences.english: We all think eating fruit means just buying fruit, cutting it up and popping it into our mouths.
sentences.chinese: 一说吃水果，我们就想到买说过，切成块，大快朵颐。

sentences.english: The ship was holed along the WL under enemy fire.
sentences.chinese: 这只船的吃水线处被敌人的炮火击穿了。

sentences.english: Some Americans from Spanish-speaking families follow a tradition for the New Year that involves fruit.
sentences.chinese: 有些说西班牙语的美国人遵循着吃水果的新年传统。

sentences.english: In Maine, boiled lobster is popular with local citizens and travelers.
sentences.chinese: 在缅因州，当地人及旅游者都喜欢吃水煮大龙虾。

sentences.english: Who eat fruits and drink fruit juice.
Ray painted below the waterline with a special anti- rust paint.
sentences.chinese: 雷用专门的防锈涂料涂船的吃水线以下的部位。

sentences.english: So you should eat fruits 2 hours after a meal or 1hour before meals.
sentences.chinese: 因此，吃水果宜在饭后2小时或饭前1小时。

sentences.english: To confirm draught on the stormy waves, a specific communicating vessel is designed, by which central surface of waves can be displayed.
sentences.chinese: 为确定有风浪时船舶的吃水值，设计了特殊的连通器。

sentences.english: The mood is difficult to be as involved as a meal drink a draught people quiet pleasure.
sentences.chinese: 情绪就难被牵扯着了饭照吃水照喝乐的一个人清静。

sentences.english: Please tell me the fore- and -after waterline on arrival and departure.
sentences.chinese: 请把靠港和离港的前后吃水数告诉我。

sentences.english: I expect to refloat when draft decreases.
sentences.chinese: 我船预计吃水减少时才能重新浮起。

sentences.english: I love doughnuts, but it's healthier to have fruit instead.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢油炸圈饼，但相反吃水果是健康的。

sentences.english: You’re probably up to your eyebrows (Botoxed or not) with hearing “eat more fruits and vegetables.”
sentences.chinese: 你可能经常听到“多吃水果及蔬菜阿”这样的说法。

sentences.english: That's the reason you eat fruits and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 那才是你吃水果蔬菜的理由。

definition: water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
dead weight/weight capacity of a vehicle
overall tonnage (of a shipping fleet or company)
